modName: Finger snap audio fix for YY-Mystic Knight by Yukl
summary:
V 2.0 is out! Eveything snaps into place! Enjoy some roy mustang fury
conjuration, alteration, illusion, restoration and a bit of destruction!
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][b]﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿THIS IS A REVOLUTION![/b]


Since 2013 we were demanding that rightful finger snap from yukl's test drive video on [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33914]YY- mystic Knight[/url]﻿

[b]BUT THOSE [u]DEMANDS[/u] WERE NEVER MET!
Until this BLESSED DAY!
No other being ever had the might, nay,  the NOBILITY to wield not one, but two
[s]infinty sto[/s] finger snap audio files.




[/b]That's right , you heard right, Lord Exiadreth looked upon the weak and delivered mercy.
But not the Thanos kind- you get the picture. Or in this case, more of a .wav

For the moment, only bound weapons and fast healing are [i][b]snapped[/b][/i]
but after some testings and editing, the 2.0 version will add some other spells if needed.
V 2.0 is out! Another act of mercy delivered!
Just drop the content of the archive in Data/sound/fx
if you don't have the folders, just create them (I know, right?That guy is a [i]wizard![/i])


Of course all credit goes to Lord Exiadreth who took about a minute to do the mod
Or you can give it to an actual modder who hatched the best animation mod on skyrim in 2013?
Lord Exiadreth doesn't really care.


oh! and it isn't compatible on SSE!*
Muahahahahahahaha
Exia-out[/center]


*[i][size=1]I'm kidding, it really is[/size][/i]
author: Exiadreth
